scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && npm run clean:amd --workspace client && npm run webpack:clean --workspace client
scripts.build: npm run build-client && npm run build-example-node && npm run build-example-client
scripts.build-example-client: npm run build --workspace client && npm run webpack:example-client-build
scripts.dev:link: npm link monaco-languageclient --workspace node && npm link monaco-languageclient --workspace client
scripts.dev:unlink: npm unlink monaco-languageclient --workspace node && npm unlink monaco-languageclient --workspace client
